properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 9 at 2:00AM EST until January 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Minor lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Macomb County.

* WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 11 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property along the
lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Southeast to South winds of 15 to 25 MPH
will cause minor flooding in the vicinity of Anchor Bay and
Harrison Township.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM EST FRIDAY
